name: Space-invaders
tagline: A java applet representation of the 1979 game "Space Invaders"
body:
Space Invaders
==============

A java applet clone of the 1979 classic arcade game.
The current version is equiped with the traditional
cloud of enemy units, the player themself, walls that
can be shot through leaving passable gaps depending on
the players location, as well as a scoring system.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
